overview: The monotonous everyday life of an elderly couple is recorded almost silently in a time frame of three days. A woman and a man who have lived their whole lives together no longer have anything in common, apart from habit and the arguments that separate them.
tagline: An elderly couple silently watches their marriage collapse into indifference and bitterness. Together yet separated from each other. A study on loneliness.
title: The End of the World
